info.summary: AI pair programming in your terminal
info.description: AI pair programming in your terminal with git integration

operating_modes.code: Default mode for writing, editing, and refactoring files directly
operating_modes.architect: Planning mode for discussing structures, design patterns, and system architecture
operating_modes.ask: Consultant mode for answering questions about code without making changes

technical.token_optimization: Token-efficient context handling and prompt caching for cost savings
technical.session_context: Maintains context throughout session, handles version control automatically

pricing_details.Open Source: Free - ~$0.007 per file processed, users pay LLM API costs only, Git integration, multiple LLM support

swe_bench.note: SWE-agent 1.0 achieved 33.83% on full SWE-bench using Claude 3.7 Sonnet (February 2025), while Aider's last published score was 26.3% on SWE-bench Lite (2024)
swe_bench.achievement: SWE-agent 1.0 achieved #1 position on full benchmark
